comment: The previous definition of function value, from before the ` iota ` operator was introduced. Although based on the idea embodied by Definition 10.2 of [Quine] p. 65 (see ~ args ), this definition apparently does not appear in the literature. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
